LanguageData.RB_CentrifugeOrganicComb.label: extract from organic comb
LanguageData.RB_CentrifugeOrganicComb.description: Centrifuges an organic comb to extract honey, wax and template genomes
LanguageData.RB_CentrifugeOrganicComb.jobString: Extracting honey, wax and template genomes
LanguageData.RB_CentrifugeHybernatingComb.label: extract from hybernating comb
LanguageData.RB_CentrifugeHybernatingComb.description: Centrifuges a hybernating comb to extract genetic honey, genewax and bear genetic material
LanguageData.RB_CentrifugeHybernatingComb.jobString: Extracting genetic honey, genewax and bear genetic material
LanguageData.RB_CentrifugeCattleComb.label: extract from cattle comb
LanguageData.RB_CentrifugeCattleComb.description: Centrifuges a cattle comb to extract milk, wool and muffalo genetic material

LanguageData.RB_CentrifugeCluckingComb.label: extract from clucking comb
LanguageData.RB_CentrifugeCluckingComb.description: Centrifuges a clucking comb to extract bee eggs, genewax and chicken genetic material

LanguageData.RB_CentrifugeExplodingComb.label: extract from exploding comb
LanguageData.RB_CentrifugeExplodingComb.description: Centrifuges an exploding comb to extract genetic honey, chemfuel, and boomalope genetic material

LanguageData.RB_CentrifugeHornedComb.label: extract from horned comb
LanguageData.RB_CentrifugeHornedComb.description: Centrifuges a horned comb to extract genetic honey, genewax, and thrumbo genetic material

LanguageData.RB_CentrifugeHoundComb.description: Centrifuges a hound comb to extract genetic honey, genewax and canine genetic material

LanguageData.RB_CentrifugeMegaspideryComb.description: Centrifuges a megaspidery comb to extract insect jelly, genewax and insectoid genetic material

LanguageData.RB_CentrifugeMousyComb.description: Centrifuges a mousy comb to extract genetic honey, genewax and rodent genetic material
